item.title: [Resolved] Degraded service
item.description: We are experiencing stability problems on the system at the moment and are looking into it. Update: we were able to recover services and are observing the situation. Update: the instabilities continued and we could identify the source. It is related to projects with many files which cause a lot of internal requests and therefore take too long to respond. A patch is deployed and being monitored.
item.content:
We are experiencing stability problems on the system at the moment and are looking into it.

Update: we were able to recover services and are observing the situation.

Update: the instabilities continued and we could identify the source. It is related to projects with many files which cause a lot of internal requests and therefore take too long to respond. A patch is deployed and being monitored.
